code: @Override protected DataFormat createDataFormat(RouteContext routeContext) {     return new org.apache.camel.impl.StringDataFormat(charset). }

comment: /**  * Sets an encoding to use.  * <p/>  * Will by default use the JVM platform default charset.  */
code: /**  * Sets an encoding to use.  * <p/>  * Will by default use the JVM platform default charset.  */ public void setCharset(String charset) {     this.charset = charset. }
